# cidrcalc
A simple command line subnet calculator

## Examples / Usage:
```
$ ./cidrcalc 22.22.22.20/23
ip        : 22.22.22.20    00010110.00010110.00010110.00010100
mask      : 255.255.254.0  11111111.11111111.11111110.00000000
minAddr   : 22.22.22.1     00010110.00010110.00010110.00000001
maxAddr   : 22.22.23.254   00010110.00010110.00010111.11111110
broadcast : 22.22.23.255   00010110.00010110.00010111.11111111
num hosts : 510

$ ./cidrcalc 192.168.122.254/31
ip      : 192.168.122.254  11000000.10101000.01111010.11111110
mask    : 255.255.255.254  11111111.11111111.11111111.11111110
minAddr : 192.168.122.254  11000000.10101000.01111010.11111110
maxAddr : 192.168.122.255  11000000.10101000.01111010.11111111
```
